thread.title: Daredevil Hull dog eagerly hitches ride on owner's back
thread.title_full: Daredevil Hull dog eagerly hitches ride on owner's back

title: Daredevil Hull dog eagerly hitches ride on owner's back
text: Share this article Share He adjusts his furry paws to hold on and looks around nonplussed as the pair cycle down the street. Judging by Nippa's eagerness to hitch up on the biker's shoulders, it's a trick the two have been practicing for some time. All aboard! On command Nippa eagerly leaps up into his owner Jordan's arms Nippa quickly settles in on Jordan's shoulders and prepares for their big adventure The unlikely duo do attract some attention from a trio of workmen on the estate in Kingston upon Hull, who can be heard chuckling as they pass by. The pair reach the end of the road before turning round and coming back home. The pair take a ride up the street, much to the amusement of a group of workmen Share or comment on this article Most watched News videos
